languages.text: {n}Похоже, Руолдо не падает духом: сменить сверкающие шпили улья на темные башни феодального мира — такое бы кого угодно подкосило.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Похоже, Руолдо не падает духом: сменить сверкающие шпили улья на темные башни феодального мира — такое бы кого угодно подкосило.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem disheartened: exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo does not seem disheartened: exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ルオルドは少しもこたえてない。輝くハイヴの尖塔を暗い封建世界の塔に替えるなんて、大半の人間なら心が折れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドは少しもこたえてない。輝くハイヴの尖塔を暗い封建世界の塔に替えるなんて、大半の人間なら心が折れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo no parece entristecido en lo más mínimo; cambiar las rutilantes espiras de una colmena por las lóbregas torres de un mundo feudal habría hundido la moral de cualquier persona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo no parece entristecido en lo más mínimo; cambiar las rutilantes espiras de una colmena por las lóbregas torres de un mundo feudal habría hundido la moral de cualquier persona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}原本生活在巢都上层熠熠生辉的尖塔，突然被丢到封建世界阴暗的塔楼，这样的落差恐怕会让很多人精神崩溃。然而，罗尔多却似乎一丁点都不介意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}原本生活在巢都上层熠熠生辉的尖塔，突然被丢到封建世界阴暗的塔楼，这样的落差恐怕会让很多人精神崩溃。然而，罗尔多却似乎一丁点都不介意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo wirkt kein bisschen entmutigt ... die prächtigen Gebäude einer Makropole gegen die dunklen Türme einer Feudalwelt zu tauschen, hätte nicht wenige gebrochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo wirkt kein bisschen entmutigt ... die prächtigen Gebäude einer Makropole gegen die dunklen Türme einer Feudalwelt zu tauschen, hätte nicht wenige gebrochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo ne semble pas le moins du monde abattu ; pourtant, abandonner les spires étincelantes d'une ruche pour les sombres tours d'un monde féodal briserait bien des esprits.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo does not seem in the least disheartened — exchanging the gleaming spires of a hive for the dark towers of a feudal world would have broken the spirit of many.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo ne semble pas le moins du monde abattu ; pourtant, abandonner les spires étincelantes d'une ruche pour les sombres tours d'un monde féodal briserait bien des esprits.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo'nun hiç de cesareti kırılmış gibi görünmüyor. Bir kovanın parıldayan kulelerini bir feodal dünyanın karanlık kuleleriyle değiştirmek, birçoklarının ruhunu kırardı.{/n}
